activities: Bullhorn is a Software as a Service Customer Relationship Management (CRM) platform with analytics, back office, and messaging capabilities. Bullhorn allows its customers  to enter and manage information of their respective clients into the system. In this capacity, Bullhorn is the data processor and does not determine the control or scope of the data,which may include personal information, that is entered. Bullhorn's customer is the data controller.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
